ProjectTitle: The central role of the duodenal microenvironment in functional dyspepsia.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
18/07/2022
7. Sharing: have you considered using repositories for data preservation and sharing, maybe the EMBL-EBI repositories may be suitable  (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/)? For data for which there is no good disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr). You can restrict access to the datasets if needed but your data will get a DOI or accession number that you can use in your publication, and the metadata that repositories add makes the data more findable.
label: good with suggestions
